channel.title: R on Sam's Emotions
channel.description: Recent content in R on Sam's Emotions

item.title: R Markdown
item.description: The rmarkdown package is a single package, but “R Markdown” is the backbone for an ecosystem of packages for creating computational documents in R. In this workshop, we’ll use the development version installed from GitHub. install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("rstudio/rmarkdown")

item.title: A first post
item.description: Hi, I'm the here-bot cat! Use me to find your way in your website. Here I am: content/blog/spoonful-series/01-spoonful.md To remove me, delete this line inside that file: {{< here >}} My content section is: blog My layout is: single-series does this work? or this? Let’s start. beginning middle end

item.title: Distill
item.description: Distill is a package built for R Markdown, an ecosystem of packages for creating computational documents in R. The goal of the Distill package is to provide an output format optimized for online scientific and technical communication. You may install it from CRAN: install.packages("distill") In this workshop, we’ll also use the postcards package to generate a nice “about” page for your distill website. You may also install it from CRAN:

item.title: A second post
Blogdown
item.description: The goal of the blogdown package is to provide a powerful and infinitely customizable website output format for R Markdown. You may install it from CRAN: install.packages("blogdown") Additional resources Up & running with blogdown in 2021 Unbreak your blogdown site A spoonful of Hugo series

item.title: A third post
item.description: Hi, I'm the here-bot cat! Use me to find your way in your website. Here I am: content/blog/spoonful-series/03-spoonful/index.markdown Here is my R Markdown source file: blog/spoonful-series/03-spoonful/index.Rmarkdown You'll want to edit this file, then re-knit to see the changes take effect in your site preview. To remove me, delete this line inside that file: {{< here >}} My content section is: blog My layout is: single-series Images in this page bundle: /blog/spoonful-series/03-spoonful/featured-photo.

item.title: A Spoonful of Hugo
item.description: ** No content below YAML for the series _index. This file is a leaf bundle, and provides settings for the listing page layout and sidebar content.**
